title: Ticket #7307: Further clarify job event log number 009 text
description:
• Change the trailing 'aborted' to 'removed', since that matches the verb we use everywhere else.
  • Confirm that the new parser reads both v8.9.4 and pre-v8.9.4 events.
  • Add a release note -- see the previous two releases -- about breaking external parsers.
